page.title: 10UNEMPLOYMENT IN TREHARRISS
page.content: that there was a lot of unemployment in Treharris and that the rate of unemployment for the Merthyr District including Treharris is twenty percent. The unemployment is peculiar to certain age groups,young people aged sixteen to twenty and to men aged forty five to fifty particuliarly those made redundant from other jobs. Mrs. James told us that there were more men unemployed than women. When we asked her why she said there are more jobs available for skilled women than men. We asked her did she have a lot of jobs to offer and she said she did have a lot of jobs to offer but people were very selective about the jobs they wanted e.g. some people were willing to travel and others not. Mrs. James did say that the better your education, the better your chance of a job. Lisa Jones.
